oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MATHEMATICAL MODELLING OF WATER-QUALITY FOR LONG TIME PERIODS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Huizinga, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mathematical model
water quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a one-dimensional dynamic water-quality model suitable for long-term application to estuaries. The computation techniques used in the model are very simple, but very good results have been obtained both for theoretical test cases and from applications to estuaries when compared with prototype measurements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 19 (1984): Proceedings of 19th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Houston, Texas, 1984.; 207
